narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Homecare Services for Ind. Living is a Home Health provider based in Brooklyn, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $103.2M in Medicaid payments across 476K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $103.2M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 12,902 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
